summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3470, for the improvement of Walden Street, from Rainier Avenue to Horton Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43018 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
